On April 29, Andor (Season 2)’s next three episodes come out on Disney Plus. Season 2 resumes the journey of Cassian Andor, […] The post Disney Plus Schedule April 28 – May 4 2025: New TV Shows & Movies Being Added appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.

excerpt: Are you growing curious about the Disney Plus schedule from April 28 to May 4, 2025? Here is a list of releases.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Disney Plus‘s new TV and movie release schedule for April 28- May 4, 2025, includes Andor (Season 2)’s next three episodes, Chibi Tiny Tales: Shorts Season 5, and Mickey Mouse Funhouse Season 3. On April 29, Andor (Season 2)’s next three episodes come out on Disney Plus. Season 2 resumes the journey of Cassian Andor, who plays a key role in the Rebel Alliance with the war on the horizon. The previous episode showcased Cassian connecting with Kleya Marki and identifying the danger surrounding his friends on Mina-Rau. Further, Syril and Dedra host the former’s mother, Eedy, for dinner. However, Syril ends up getting insulted. Later, Leida marries Stekan Sculdun on Chandrila. Also coming out on the platform is Chibi Tiny Tales: Shorts Season 5. The show is represented through vocal effects. The comedy short series revolves around numerous Disney characters being portrayed in chibi style. Additionally, Mickey Mouse Funhouse Season 3 drops on Disney Plus. The animated adventure series chronicles the journey of Mickey and his friends, Minnie and Funny. The trio decides to explore the Kingdom of Majestica to find out whether dragons can be friendly or not. Mickey Mouse Funhouse features a voice cast of Bret Iwan, Kaitlyn Robrock, Jan Johns, Tony Anselmo, Bill Farmer, Harvey Guillén, and many others. New Disney Plus releases for April 28 – May 4 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from April 28, 2025, to May 4, 2025 April 29 and April 30 Andor (Season 2) – Three New Episodes at 6 pm Pacific Time – April 29 Chibi Tiny Tales: Shorts (S5, 7 episodes) – April 30 Mickey Mouse Funhouse (S3, 5 episodes) – April 30 May 1 and May 2 Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse – May 1 Rise Up, Sing Out (Shorts) (S2, 7 episodes) – May 1 Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols (S1, 6 episodes) – May 2 May 3 and May 4 Doctor Who – Season 2 – New Episode – May 3 Star Wars: Tales Of The Underworld – May 4 Star Wars: Galaxy’s Edge | Disneyland Resort – May 4 For more Disney Plus content, check out the title of the Darth Maul Animated Show. Also, check out this exciting photo from the sets of Malcolm in the Middle.
html:
Disney Plus‘s new TV and movie release schedule for April 28- May 4, 2025, includes Andor (Season 2)’s next three episodes, Chibi Tiny Tales: Shorts Season 5, and Mickey Mouse Funhouse Season 3.

On April 29, Andor (Season 2)’s next three episodes come out on Disney Plus. Season 2 resumes the journey of Cassian Andor, who plays a key role in the Rebel Alliance with the war on the horizon. The previous episode showcased Cassian connecting with Kleya Marki and identifying the danger surrounding his friends on Mina-Rau. Further, Syril and Dedra host the former’s mother, Eedy, for dinner. However, Syril ends up getting insulted. Later, Leida marries Stekan Sculdun on Chandrila.

Also coming out on the platform is Chibi Tiny Tales: Shorts Season 5. The show is represented through vocal effects. The comedy short series revolves around numerous Disney characters being portrayed in chibi style.

Additionally, Mickey Mouse Funhouse Season 3 drops on Disney Plus. The animated adventure series chronicles the journey of Mickey and his friends, Minnie and Funny. The trio decides to explore the Kingdom of Majestica to find out whether dragons can be friendly or not. Mickey Mouse Funhouse features a voice cast of Bret Iwan, Kaitlyn Robrock, Jan Johns, Tony Anselmo, Bill Farmer, Harvey Guillén, and many others.

New Disney Plus releases for April 28 – May 4 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from April 28, 2025, to May 4, 2025

April 29 and April 30

  • Andor (Season 2) – Three New Episodes at 6 pm Pacific Time – April 29
  • Chibi Tiny Tales: Shorts (S5, 7 episodes) – April 30
  • Mickey Mouse Funhouse (S3, 5 episodes) – April 30

May 1 and May 2

  • Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse – May 1
  • Rise Up, Sing Out (Shorts) (S2, 7 episodes) – May 1
  • Genghis Khan: The Secret History of the Mongols (S1, 6 episodes) – May 2

May 3 and May 4

  • Doctor Who – Season 2 – New Episode – May 3
  • Star Wars: Tales Of The Underworld – May 4
  • Star Wars: Galaxy’s Edge | Disneyland Resort – May 4

For more Disney Plus content, check out the title of the Darth Maul Animated Show. Also, check out this exciting photo from the sets of Malcolm in the Middle.
